DOC.brief_summary: The Thoracic ultrasound is a safer and sensitive technique than conventional radiography because it detects less than 1 cm pneumonic consolidations and minimal pleural effusions. The main objective is to evaluate the efficacy of thoracic ultrasound performed by unskilled personnel in the emergency service prdiatricas to diagnose pneumonia in children.
DOC.brief_title: Can the Thoracic Replace the Conventional Radiography for the Diagnosis of Acute Pneumonia in Children?
